# Brand logos for Popular Brands section

Brands we show: **ViewSonic, Lenovo, BenQ, MSI, HP, LG, ASUS, Dell**

Save logo files in this folder: **`public/brands/`**

---

## Required format

| Requirement | Spec |
|-------------|------|
| **File types** | WebP, PNG, SVG, or MP4 (video) |
| **Dimensions** | **120 × 48 px** (or 150 × 60 px) recommended |
| **Background** | **Transparent** for PNG/SVG |

---

## Filenames (use exact names)

| Filename | Brand |
|----------|--------|
| `viewsonic.png` or `viewsonic.svg` | ViewSonic |
| `lenovo.png` or `lenovo.svg` or `Lenovo.mp4` | Lenovo |
| `benq.png` or `benq.svg` | BenQ |
| `msi.png` or `msi.svg` | MSI |
| `hp.png` or `hp.svg` or `hp.json` (Lottie) | HP |
| `lg.png` or `lg.svg` | LG |
| `Asus Brand Logo.mp4` (or `asus.svg` / `asus.png`) | ASUS |
| `dell.webp` or `dell.png` or `dell.svg` | Dell |

If a file is missing, the site will try Clearbit’s logo URL, then show the brand name.
